title: Broken Glasses: Pack1
description: Small Shattered Glasses - A foley SFX Pack
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Introducing “Broken Glasses: Pack1”, a collection of UI/UX responsive sounds, this pack represents sounds such of scraping and friction between broken glass pieces

“With sonic characteristics of crisp, realistic sounds of glass breaking into tiny pieces, scraping and tinkling, and the delicate sound of glass shards sliding against each other, it creates a sense of shattering.”


 Why Choose ‘Broken Glasses: Pack1’?


Industry-Leading Sound Design: Our team of experts meticulously recorded and edited each sound using cutting-edge tools.

Polished Perfection: We further polished every sound in our go-to digital audio workstation (DAW).

Versatile Usage: Whether you’re designing a horror game, an action-packed scene, or a serene environment, these glass sounds fit seamlessly.

Get ready to elevate your game audio with the authenticity of “Broken Glasses: Pack1”.
